Author: babyfaced-bitch
Text: Oof I’m so sorry to hear that they don’t list them where you go with your dad. I don’t know if it’s illegal to not list them where I’m from but it certainly is painfully stressful. It would be much less anxiety-inducing if they were listed.

Author: mashedupcrayons
Text: I hate that?? I have to go to breakfast with my dad on Tuesdays and the resurant we go to does not have any calories anywhere. And its illegal for a chain to do that here. Menus really should always have calories, and not just for people with EDs
